Welcome.title: Startup investing made simple, for everyone
Welcome.descr: Jibrel enables startups and investors to connect in a previously unimaginable way to create capital formation.
Welcome.offer: Sign up for early access today!
Advantages.title: Advantages
Advantages.card_1.title: Access to Global Markets
Advantages.card_1.descr: Jibrel empowers startups with tech tools that facilitate leaner, quicker and cheaper testing of their value propositions.
Advantages.card_2.title: Transparency for Investors
Advantages.card_2.descr: Jibrel provides retail and professional investors globally with transparency of opportunities eliminating information asymmetries and subjectivity from the investment process.
Advantages.card_3.title: Reach to Startups
Advantages.card_3.descr: Jibrel does not only bring better access to international investors, but also makes managing thousands of investors is now just as easy as managing three.
WhatsForYou.title: What’s for you?
WhatsForYou.card_1.title: Global Liquidity at a Fraction of the Cost and Time
WhatsForYou.card_1.descr: Jibrel stimulates global capital formation and reduces market frictions by deploying best-in-class financial and regulatory technology empowering startups with reach and investors with access to a historically exclusive and marginal asset class.
WhatsForYou.card_2.title: Get in Early
WhatsForYou.card_2.descr: Invest early in the disruption of multi-billion dollar industries alongside seasoned investors and industry veterans. Support the companies you believe in and want to see succeed in the future.
WhatsForYou.card_3.title: It’s Secure, Simple and Fast
WhatsForYou.card_3.descr: We’ve done the complicated stuff so you won’t have to. Jibrel is a regulated full-service online investment platform which offers a compliant, seamless and smart investor experience. To start investing, simply sign up, select your startup and invest!
WhatsForYou.card_4.title: Experience the Potential of Exponential Technologies
WhatsForYou.card_4.descr: Tokenization of equity is a more efficient means of securitization which can unlock value beyond financial returns for startups, investors and ecosystem enablers. It redefines how companies are built, funded and managed.
Tagline.message: Reimagining how companies are built, funded and managed
